description: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework.

topics.title: Express Setup and Basic Server
topics.english: Set up Express server with basic routing and middleware.
topics.hinglish: Express server setup karo basic routing aur middleware ke saath.

topics.title: Routing and HTTP Methods
topics.english: Handle different HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) with routes.
topics.hinglish: Different HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) handle karo routes ke saath.

topics.title: Middleware Basics
topics.english: Use middleware for request processing, logging, authentication.
topics.hinglish: Request processing, logging, authentication ke liye middleware use karo.
examples:
// Body parser
app.use(express.json());

practice.question: What is middleware?
practice.answer: Functions that process requests before reaching routes

components.name: Next Function
components.hinglish: Control next middleware ko pass karo

topics.title: Request and Response Objects
topics.english: Access request data and send responses with proper status codes.
topics.hinglish: Request data access karo aur proper status codes ke saath responses bhejo.

topics.title: Static Files and Templates
topics.english: Serve static files (CSS, images) and render dynamic templates.
topics.hinglish: Static files (CSS, images) serve karo aur dynamic templates render karo.
examples:
// Serve static files
app.use(express.static('public'));

topics.title: Router and Route Separation
topics.english: Organize routes using Express Router for better code structure.
topics.hinglish: Better code structure ke liye Express Router use karke routes organize karo.

components.name: Route Separation
components.hinglish: Feature/module ke hisaab se separate karo

topics.title: Error Handling
topics.english: Implement error handling middleware for graceful error responses.
topics.hinglish: Graceful error responses ke liye error handling middleware implement karo.

practice.question: Where to place error middleware?
practice.answer: After all routes and other middleware

components.name: Error Propagation
components.hinglish: Errors pass karne ke liye next(err) use karo

topics.title: Database Integration
topics.english: Connect Express with databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) using drivers or ORMs.
topics.hinglish: Express ko databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) se connect karo drivers ya ORMs use karke.

topics.title: Authentication and Authorization
topics.hinglish: User authentication (login/register) aur authorization (permissions) implement karo.

practice.question: What is JWT?
practice.answer: JSON Web Token for stateless authentication

components.name: JWT
components.hinglish: Authentication ke liye JSON Web Token

components.name: Password Hashing
components.hinglish: Secure password storage ke liye bcrypt

topics.title: File Uploads
topics.english: Handle file uploads with Multer middleware.
topics.hinglish: Multer middleware ke saath file uploads handle karo.

practice.question: Which Multer method for single file?

components.name: Multer
components.hinglish: Multipart/form-data handle karne ke liye middleware

topics.title: API Development Best Practices
topics.english: Build RESTful APIs with proper status codes, versioning, documentation, and security.
topics.hinglish: Proper status codes, versioning, documentation aur security ke saath RESTful APIs banao.

practice.question: What is CORS?
practice.answer: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing, allows different domain requests

topics.title: WebSockets with Socket.io
topics.english: Implement real-time communication using Socket.io with Express.
topics.hinglish: Express ke saath Socket.io use karke real-time communication implement karo.

practice.question: When to use WebSockets?
practice.answer: Real-time apps: chat, notifications, live updates

components.name: Rooms
components.hinglish: Targeted messaging ke liye sockets group karo

topics.title: Deployment and Production
topics.english: Deploy Express apps to production with PM2, Nginx, environment variables.
topics.hinglish: Express apps ko PM2, Nginx, environment variables ke saath production mein deploy karo.
examples:
// PM2 process manager
pm2 start app.js

topics.title: Testing Express Apps
topics.english: Write tests for Express routes and middleware using Jest and Supertest.
topics.hinglish: Jest aur Supertest use karke Express routes aur middleware ke liye tests likho.

components.name: Mocking
components.hinglish: Database aur external services mock karo
